body.gatha1: Cakkhunā saṃvaro sādhu, sādhu sotena saṃvaro;
body.gathalast: Ghānena saṃvaro sādhu, sādhu jivhāya saṃvaro.
body.gatha1: Kāyena saṃvaro sādhu, sādhu vācāya saṃvaro;
body.gatha2: Manasā saṃvaro sādhu, sādhu sabbattha saṃvaro;
body.gathalast: Sabbattha saṃvuto bhikkhu, sabbadukkhā pamuccati.
Ajjhattarato samāhito, eko santusito tamāhu bhikkhuṃ.
Atthaṃ dhammañca dīpeti, madhuraṃ tassa bhāsitaṃ.
Dhammaṃ anussaraṃ bhikkhu, saddhammā na parihāyati.
Aññesaṃ pihayaṃ bhikkhu, samādhiṃ nādhigacchati.
Taṃ ve devā pasaṃsanti, suddhājīviṃ atanditaṃ.
Asatā ca na socati, sa ve ‘‘bhikkhū’’ti vuccati.
Adhigacche padaṃ santaṃ, saṅkhārūpasamaṃ sukhaṃ.
body.gatha1: Siñca bhikkhu imaṃ nāvaṃ, sittā te lahumessati;
body.gathalast: Chetvā rāgañca dosañca, tato nibbānamehisi.
body.gatha1: Pañca chinde pañca jahe, pañca cuttari bhāvaye;
body.gathalast: Pañca saṅgātigo bhikkhu, ‘‘oghatiṇṇo’’ti vuccati.
Mā lohaguḷaṃ gilī pamatto, mā kandi ‘‘dukkhamida’’nti ḍayhamāno.
Yamhi jhānañca paññā ca, sa ve nibbānasantike.
Amānusī rati hoti, sammā dhammaṃ vipassato.
Indriyagutti santuṭṭhi, pātimokkhe ca saṃvaro.
Tato pāmojjabahulo, dukkhassantaṃ karissati.
Evaṃ rāgañca dosañca, vippamuñcetha bhikkhavo.
Vantalokāmiso bhikkhu, ‘‘upasanto’’ti vuccati.
So attagutto satimā, sukhaṃ bhikkhu vihāhisi.
Adhigacche padaṃ santaṃ, saṅkhārūpasamaṃ sukhaṃ.
